CondenseIt.title: CondenseIt
CondenseIt.description: Quickly distill the essential points from any paper. CondenseIt simplifies the process of summarizing long-form content, making it ideal for students, researchers, and professionals who need concise, clear summaries in seconds.
CondenseIt.points: You need 30 point to do it!

DescribeIt.title: DescribeIt
DescribeIt.description: Effortlessly generate product descriptions by simply uploading an image. DescribeIt streamlines the process for online sellers, making it easy to create compelling and accurate product descriptions in seconds.

warning.title: For best results:
warning.first: Rotate images to the correct orientation before uploading.

DescribeIt.points: You need 10 point to do it!

LectureBrief.title: Lecture Brief
LectureBrief.description: Simplify lecture content into essential takeaways. Lecturer Summarizer condenses academic lectures into clear summaries, perfect for students who need quick and efficient study aids.
LectureBrief.points: You need 15 point to do it!
